achievementbadges-anon-text: Shown in [[Special:Achievements]] when user tries to access their achievements before logging in
special-achievements: Title for the special page that lists all achievements.
special-achievements-header-not-earning-:
Label for the achieved achievements sub-section.

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the user views the page
special-shareachievementsbadge: Title for the special page that the user can share their achievement badge
special-shareachievementsbadge-invalid-u: Error message which is shown when given username is wrong
special-shareachievementsbadge-invalid-a: Error message which is shown when given achievement key is wrong
special-shareachievementsbadge-message:
Message displayed to whom earn the achievement in [[Special:ShareAchievementBadge]].

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the user who earn the achievement
special-shareachievementsbadge-message-o:
Message displayed to whom does not earn the achievement in [[Special:ShareAchievementBadge]].

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the user who earn the achievement
special-shareachievementsbadge-title:
This message is shown in [[Special:ShareAchievementBadge]] as a title.
* $1 - user's name
* $2 - the name of the obtained achievement
special-shareachievementsbadge-external-: This is used as a Open Graph description.
special-shareachievementsbadge-header-sh:
This is a label is used as a header in [[Special:ShareAchievementBadge]].

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the user who earn the achievement
special-shareachievementsbadge-item-face: This is a label for a link for sharing.
special-shareachievementsbadge-item-twit: This is a label for a link for sharing.
special-shareachievementsbadge-tweet:
This is used to send a new tweet.
* $1 - user's name
* $2 - the name of the obtained achievement
* $3 - URL to the achievement page
special-shareachievementsbadge-tweet-vie:
This is used to send a new tweet that is obtained by other than the user who tweets.
* $1 - user's name
* $2 - the name of the obtained achievement
* $3 - URL to the achievement page
achievement-earned-at:
This message is shown with each earned achievements

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the user who earn the achievement
$2 - time
achievement-earned-at-tooltip:
This message is shown as a tooltip for each earned achievements

Parameters:
* $1 - date
* $2 - time
achievements-summary: Explanatory text shown at the top of [[Special:Achievements]].
achievementbadges-beta-feature-achieveme:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as description for the checkbox to enable the achievement system.

The label for this checkbox is {{msg-mw|achievementbadges-beta-feature-achievement-enable-message}}.
achievementbadges-disabled:
Used as error message in [[Special:Achievements]] when the feature is disabled by the user.

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the user
log-name-achievementbadges:
{{doc-logpage}}

The name of the achievement log. Used as heading on [[Special:Log/create]] and in the drop down menu for selecting logs on [[Special:Log]].
notification-header-achievementbadges-ea:
Header text for a notification when you are earned an achievement.
* $1 - user's name (not suitable for GENDER).
* $2 - user's name for use in GENDER.
* $3 - the name of the obtained achievement
notification-bundle-header-achievementba:
Notification header text for when there is a multiple achievements a user earn. Parameters:
* $1 - user's name (not suitable for GENDER).
* $2 - user's name for use in GENDER.
* $3 - the number of the obtained achievement
notification-link-text-all-achievements: Label for button that links to [[Special:Achievements]]
